example:
() => (
  <Stack flex>
    <TextLink
      href="https://orbit.kiwi"
      external
      iconRight={<Icons.NewWindow ariaLabel="Opens in new window" />}
    >
      Orbit design system
    </TextLink>
    <TextLink iconRight={<Icons.ChevronRight />}>Skip this step</TextLink>
  </Stack>
)

info.title: Icons
info.description: Icons add visual context to text links, such as letting users know the link will open in a new window/tab or that they are moving forward in the flow. Remember to include all necessary information also non-visually so everyone can access it.
